titles.title: A bill to exclude certain farmout agreements from property of the estate.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/14/1988--Introduced. Amends Federal bankruptcy provisions to exclude property interests in, or contract rights to, hydrocarbons and other minerals produced with hydrocarbons from a debtor's estate to the extent that such debtor has contractually transferred such interests or rights.
